xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 30 May 2013
xwikidoc.content: <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 04:44 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 10:24 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 10:56 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 12:05 <BogdanVancea> has joined #ccm 12:27 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 13:01 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 13:10 <marta> hi ravigarg27 13:10 <ravigarg27> hii marta 13:10 <marta> remember your early experiments with ctakes + the human phenotype ontology? 13:11 <ravigarg27> yup went through those in these two days 13:11 <marta> could you make the code available somewhere? i'd like to play with it a little bit to figure out what works and what doesn't for recognition of hpo terms 13:12 <ravigarg27> sure should I mail it to you? 13:13 <marta> well, you could commit it on github :) 13:13 <marta> just make a new repo for it in your account 13:14 <ravigarg27> okay 13:14 <ravigarg27> will ping you as soon as I complete it 13:14 <marta> thanks 13:20 <marta> BogdanVancea: you'll soon have access to a couple of machines at our lab where you can play with a distributed solr 13:20 <BogdanVancea> hello marta 13:20 <BogdanVancea> awesome 13:20 <BogdanVancea> :D 13:22 <marta> it should have been done sooner, but waaaay too many people take their vacation in may :-| 13:23 <BogdanVancea> hehe 13:23 <BogdanVancea> isn't august the month when everyone's taking a vacation? 13:58 <marta> here everyone feels an urge to run away as soon as the school year ends 14:13 <BogdanVancea> school year already ended there? 14:14 <sdumitriu1> Yes 14:14 <sdumitriu1> For a while 14:14 <BogdanVancea> oh, I see 14:14 <BogdanVancea> nice 14:14 <sdumitriu1> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Academic_year#Canada 14:15 <sdumitriu1> "Most universities and colleges usually run from early September until the end of April or early May" 14:17 <BogdanVancea> hehe 14:19 <BogdanVancea> I still have a month and 1 week until my bachelor exam 14:20 <BogdanVancea> sort of a short summer 14:21 <sdumitriu1> But you're done with the code and the written disertation, right? 14:22 <BogdanVancea> pretty much 14:22 <BogdanVancea> advisor keeps reading 14:22 <BogdanVancea> I keep changing 14:23 <BogdanVancea> but it's pretty much done :) 14:29 <BogdanVancea> even though I don't have to actually work for the bachelor project now, I can't wait to finish up with it 15:05 <BogdanVancea_> has joined #ccm 15:05 <BogdanVancea_> seems like I've succesfully managed to crash my ubuntu 15:05 <BogdanVancea_> and apparently I'm also still online 15:06 <sdumitriu1> Yes, you are 15:06 <BogdanVancea_> eh, it should timeout any time now
